summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM Dashboard, Agenda, SMS Scheduler, and Address Autocomplete features. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend has some navigation issues but core dashboard functionality is working.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form shows 'Loading...' state but sometimes doesn't redirect properly after successful authentication
Navigation links to Agenda and Clients pages not consistently accessible after login

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent issues with post-login navigation, sometimes stays on login page despite successful authentication

passed_tests: Admin login with xadmin/Cali2020 credentials (backend API working)
Salesperson login with vendedor1@test.com/Test1234 credentials (backend API working)
SMS Scheduler Status API (GET /api/scheduler/status) - admin only access working
SMS Scheduler Run Now API (POST /api/scheduler/run-now) - admin only access working
Dashboard Statistics API (GET /api/dashboard/stats) - returning correct data
Appointment Status Update API (PUT /api/appointments/{id}/status) - working correctly
Dashboard page loads with correct stats cards (Total Clients: 22, Today's Appointments: 0, Sales: 0, Documents Complete: 0)
Dashboard charts display correctly (PieChart for Appointments by Status, BarChart for Salesperson Performance)
Non-admin users correctly blocked from scheduler endpoints (403 responses)
Address Autocomplete component present with Google Places API integration
Responsive design working on desktop viewport (1920x1080)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form navigation issues - login API works but form sometimes doesn't redirect properly after successful authentication. Check React routing and state management for post-login navigation.
